data.title: Stairs B Main Meddle Play
data.description: Here's a great way to set up a favorable fight towards B Main with added utility from your teammates.

data.title: Left Mid Box One Way Ruse Fight
data.description: Use this one way lineup to contest for Mid control, early into the round. Teammates from Market can also hold and contest the one way from their angle.

data.title: Aggressive Stairs B Main Ruse Control
data.description: Aggressively fight for B Main control with this standard Ruse, making it easier for you and your team to contest Attackers.

data.title: Default A Main Hold One Way Ruse
data.description: Use this simple, but strong one way smoke to pressure Attackers early into the round.
